about_the_game:
DESCRIPTION:

"Prove It If You Can! 1" is a short simulation game. that blends fun with learning. Players face a series of challenges and puzzles designed to test their skills and creativity. This game isn’t about beating the clock but about proving your abilities by overcoming unique obstacles in each level.

GOAL:

The main goal is to complete the objectives in each level. Success rewards you with points, while mistakes lead to penalties, challenging you to think, analyze, and make smart decisions throughout your journey.

LEVELS:

The game features 6 main levels and 1 secret level, each offering its own unique challenge:

  • Level 1: Jumpy Rope Fun! – Jump rope for 10 rounds

  • Level 2: Math Mastermind – Solve math problems as presented by your teacher.

  • Level 3: Vending Machine Mission – Press the right vending machine button to purchase a beverage for your friend, based on provided clues.

  • Level 4: Crosswalk Conundrum – Safely cross the road by waiting for the traffic signal.

  • Level 5: Advanced Math Mastermind – Answer 5 more challenging math problems and...

  • Secret Level: – A hidden stage where you must dodge obstacles and escape ghosts.

  • Level 6: Escape the Secret Maze – Navigate a labyrinth by following the map and choosing the correct path.
    (More levels may be added in future updates.)

FEATURES:

  • Character Selection: Choose from two unique characters, "Saeng" and "Chan".

  • Score System: Earn or lose points based on your performance in each level.

  • Second Chance: Get a second opportunity to correct mistakes by following on-screen cues with a fun twist.

  • HUD: Real-time display of your score and playtime on the screen.

  • Online Leaderboard: Compare your scores with other players and your friends!

"This game is my final project for Vocational Certificate Level 3, and it is the first game I have developed and released. If you encounter any bugs or issues, please feel free to review and provide your constructive feedback so that I can improve the game further. Thank you."
